means: 有…的面貌特征的，作为号召物的

sentence.Network_en: Featured are both his classics and his latest creations.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的经典作品和最新创作都很独特。

sentence.Network_en: He looked young, dark and sharp-featured, with hollow cheeks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看起来很年轻，肤色黝黑，五官分明，双颊凹陷。

sentence.Network_en: Jon featured in one of the show's most thrilling episodes.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔恩主演剧中最引人入胜的剧集之一。

特写/专稿/特稿  -- 来源 -- 英汉 - 翻译样例 - 行业好评(0) 差评(0)  8. a feature article  一篇特写  -- 来源 -- 英汉 - 翻译样例好评(0.
这类报道还包括新闻特写(news feature)，它有时被称作辅文（sidebar），是为配合有时效性的新闻事件所作的。例如，在一起飞机失 …

entry.def: A feature of something is an interesting or important part or characteristic of it.

example.ex: Patriotic songs have long been a feature of Kuwaiti life...
example.tran: 爱国歌曲长期以来一直是科威特生活的一个特色。

example.ex: The spacious gardens are a special feature of this property...
example.tran: 大花园是这处房产的特色。

entry.def: Your features are your eyes, nose, mouth, and other parts of your face.

example.tran: 他的容貌似乎有所改变。

entry.tran: 由…主演;以…为主要内容;重点介绍
entry.def: When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it.

example.ex: It's a great movie and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year...
example.tran: 这是一部精彩的影片，主演是一位西班牙演员，他不出一年就会成为国际巨星。

example.ex: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games...
example.tran: 这个时长一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍最近比赛的精彩片断。

entry.tran: 出演重头戏;担任主演;(在展览、杂志中)为重点推出的部分
entry.def: If someone or something features in something such as a show, exhibition, or magazine, they are an important part of it.

example.ex: Jon featured in one of the show's most thrilling episodes.
example.tran: 乔恩主演剧中最引人入胜的剧集之一。

entry.tran: (报刊或杂志的)特写，专题;(电台或电视台的)特别节目
entry.def: A feature is a special article in a newspaper or magazine, or a special programme on radio or television.

example.ex: We are delighted to see the Sunday Times running a long feature on breast cancer.
example.tran: 我们高兴地看到《星期天时报》发表了有关乳腺癌的长篇专题文章。

example.ex: ...a special feature on the fund-raising project.
example.tran: 有关集资项目的专题报道

entry.def: A feature or a feature film or movie is a full-length film about a fictional situation, as opposed to a short film or a documentary.

example.ex: ...the first feature-length cartoon, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.
example.tran: 第一部卡通长片《白雪公主和七个小矮人》

entry.tran: 地理特征;地形地物;地貌
entry.def: A geographical feature is something noticeable in a particular area of country, for example a hill, river, or valley.

means.word_mean: 1. made a feature or highlight; given prominence;
2. having facial features as specified; usually used in combination;

auth_sentence.content: Kiara Lepora is another doctor featured in the documentary.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kiara Lepora is another doctor featured in the documentary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kiara Lepora is another doctor featured in the documentary.

auth_sentence.content: Mark Lanegan once again featured as the main vocalist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mark Lanegan once again featured as the main vocalist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mark Lanegan once again featured as the main vocalist.

Sentence.sentence: Songs like "Tomorrow Never Knows", "Strawberry Fields Forever", and "A Day in the Life" featured revolutionary sound effects that dazzled and mystified Martin's American counterparts.
